sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../tab-bar.css' import { CgHome, CgSearch, CgHeart, CgProfile, CgMenuBoxed } from 'react-icons/cg' function TabBar() { const [menuFocused, setMenuFocused] = useState([true, false, false, false, false]) const focus = (ord) => { var newArr = [false, false, false, false, false] newArr[ord] = true setMenuFocused(newArr) } const focusClassName = {true: "tabBar__menu focus", false: "tabBar__menu"} return (
  • {focus(0)}}> Home
  • {focus(1)}}> Search
  • {focus(2)}}> Favorite
  • {focus(3)}}> Order
  • {focus(4)}}> Profile
) } export default TabBar
